Common.title: Weight tracking app
Common.description: We need to write description here

activityLevel.label: Activity level
activityLevel.description: Rate your activity level for the week. This value can always be changed

goal.label: Goal
goal.description: Your purpose for using this application. This value can always be changed
goal.lose: I want to lose my weight
goal.maintain: I want to maintain my weight
goal.gain: I want to gain my weight

name.required: Meal name is required and cannot be empty.

weight.positive: Weight must be a positive number.

time.format: Invalid time format. Please use HH:mm.

avgCalories.positive: Calories must be a positive number.

proteins.positive: Protein content must be a positive number.

fats.positive: Fat content must be a positive number.

carbohydrates.positive: Carbohydrate content must be a positive number.

weight.positive: Weight must be a positive number

height.positive: Height must be a positive number

activityLevel.positive: Activity level must be a positive number

avgCalories.positive: Calories must be a positive number

proteins.positive: Proteins must be a positive number

fats.positive: Fats must be a positive number

carbohydrates.positive: Carbohydrates must be a positive number

Error.requestLimit: You have reached predictions limit per day. Now you need to enter calories infomation manually or try tomorrow
Error.unknownMeal: Can't predict calories because the meal is unknown
Error.emailNotFound: User by this email doesn't exists
Error.emailInUseClient: Something went wrong. Try again later

OpenAI.SystemMessage: You are a nutrition expert. Your task is to estimate the calorie content of a dish based on its name and weight in grams. Give the minimum, maximum and average calorie value, as well as the approximate amount of proteins, fats, carbohydrates. Also explain what the range of these indicators depends on. If you do not know the dish - write that the dish is unknown, and do not try to predict it
OpenAI.UserPromt: Calculate the calorie content and approximate amount of proteins, fats, carbohydrates of the dish ':mealName', which weighs approximately :weight grams.

PossibilitiesList.description_id1: Beautiful and useful charts with data of weight, proteins, fats and carbohydrates
PossibilitiesList.description_id2: This calendar shows your statistic of eating proteins, fats and carbohydrates
PossibilitiesList.description_id3: You can enter your food and connected api shows amount of calories
PossibilitiesList.description_id4: You select target of your body and achive your plan

Hero.title: Take Control of Your Nutrition & Health!
Hero.description: NutriTrack helps you effortlessly track your meals, calories, and progress. Set goals, get insights, and stay on top of your health with smart automation.

About.title: About Project
About.subTitle: Your Smart Companion for a Healthier Life
About.pText: NutriTrack is designed to make nutrition tracking simple and effective. Whether you're aiming to lose weight, gain muscle, or maintain a balanced diet, our intelligent system helps you stay on track with accurate meal analysis, calorie counting, and progress insights.

FillProfilePage.headerDescription: We will use your details only for your calculations
FillProfilePage.weightDescription: Your current weight will be used to calculate your daily food intake. You can enter your weight daily to track your progress.
FillProfilePage.heightDescription: The height will be used to calculate the daily food intake.
FillProfilePage.descriptionDate: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.

ProfilePage.descriptionDate: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.

AddWeightModal.title: Log Your Weight Today
AddWeightModal.description: Track your progress by entering your current weight. Consistency is key!
AddWeightModal.weightDescription: Enter your weight in kilograms (kg) for accurate tracking and insights.

MealForm.dialogDescription: Enter your meal details, and we'll calculate the calories for you. Be specific with the name and include key ingredients for better accuracy.
MealForm.mealNameDescription: Enter the exact meal name with key ingredients for accurate calorie estimation.
MealForm.mealWeightDescription: Specify the meal's weight in grams for precise calculations.

MealFullInfoForm.caloriesDescription: In parentheses is the possible range from the min to the max value.
MealFullInfoForm.timeDescription: Specify the time of this meal.

Legend.noInformation: No meal data available for this day.
Legend.moreCalories: Calorie intake is either too low or too high.
Legend.enoughCalories: Calorie intake is within the target range.

Day.noInfo: No meal data available for this day.
